restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.

exportControl.exportRegistrationStmt: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.

restrictionInstructions.dataHandling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
restrictionInstructions.dataDisclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

reqCondGroup.condition: The bicycle is held safely on a work stand.

reqSafety.warning: Do not ride a bicycle with no grips on the handlebar. This can cause the hands of the rider to slip.

step.title: Remove the grips
step.instruction: Put a long thin screwdriver below the grip and apply water between the grip and the handle bar.
Turn the grip forwards and rearwards to loosen it and then pull it off the end of the handlebar.

step.title: Remove the brake and the shift levers from the handlebars
step.instruction: Loosen the clamp screw (refer to ) which is behind or below the brake lever (as shown).
*Figure: Loosen the clamp screw with the Allen wrench* (Graphic: ICN-C0419-S1000D0389-001-01)
Remove the lever and the mount from the handlebar.
Loosen the clamp bolt and remove the shifter from the handlebar.

step.title: Remove the handlebar
step.instruction: Use a and loosen the clamp bolt (refer to ). To remove, move the handlebar out of the stem.
